content: in this legal case the court in benevento made a final ruling involving multiple parties the court divided the assets of the deceased individuals such as buildings land and other properties based on their shares they also determined the debit balances for each party the court rejected a request for reimbursement of expenses for improvements to the common property the case was initiated by one party who owned a share of a building and garden and requested authorization to secure a terrace in the attic and divide the property among the coowners after a hearing where parties presented their arguments and objections were considered an expert witness conducted investigations and created a divisional plan the court reviewed various division proposals and approved a project that closely adhered to the current state of affairs shares were allocated to each party based on their ownership and possession of the properties the court also addressed objections regarding adjustments and the allocation of specific rooms determining adjustment amounts and ordering parties to offset costs the courts final ruling divided the assets according to the division project assigned portions to each party and made adjustments to financial balances the court declared the request for reimbursement of expenses as inadmissible and directed the registrar to transcribe the judgment the parties were compensated for the costs of the litigation the ruling was made on may 7 2020 and filed in the clerks office on may 15 2020
